attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This name change will front a culture change from excessive alcohol consumption during the week to that involving Saturday imbibing.  

Britain has a poor reputation for "binge drinking" and it has had a detrimental effect on the health of British people, as well our reputation abroad.  This measure will ensure that a more positive approach is adopted to weekend relaxation.

With the change from Saturday becoming Swallyday people will be able to plan their leisure and recreation events better.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
